import { ArrowLeftIcon, ArrowRightIcon, CheckIcon, XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; import axios from 'axios'; import React from 'react' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react/cjs/react.development' export default function HasilId() { const [dataExam, setDataExam] = useState([]); const [indexNumber, setIndexNumber] = useState(0) const { option, question } = dataExam[indexNumber] || {} const nextHandler = () => { if (dataExam.length - 1 === indexNumber) return; setIndexNumber(indexNumber + 1) } const prevHandler = () => { if (indexNumber === 0) return; setIndexNumber(indexNumber - 1) } const selectOption = (indexSelected, indexOptionSelected, value) => { setDataExam (dataExam.map((item, index) => index === indexSelected ? { ...item, selected: 1, option: option.map((item, index) => index === indexOptionSelected ? { ...item, selected: 1 } : { ...item, selected: 0 } ), } : item )) } useEffect(() => { const getData = async () => { let { data } = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/exam/result/180`) setDataExam(data.data.exam) } getData() }, []) console.log(dataExam); return (
